body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Carter's Car Dealership. My name is Michael Carter. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Can I have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, and may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Victoria. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling frustrated as the car I was interested in seems to be out of stock.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Victoria. Let me check our inventory and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Victoria. We will look into this matter and reach out to you as soon as we have more information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
